attributes.action: publicly censure Japan and other nations seeking to undermine the international moratorium on whaling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Japanese are attempting to use aid money as a bribe to coerce nations with no conceivable interest in whaling into supporting further erosion of the international moratorium.

There is no humane way of killing these animals and there can be no legitimate justification for industrialised whaling.  The 'scientific' cover story should be exposed as the sordid compromise it truly is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
